title: Re-air: Hosting for the Holidays | How to Be a Generous Host
description: In this episode of Dear Alice, we talk about how to be a generous host. From the food you choose, the music you play, the lighting, and even the set up of the furniture.
itunes:author: LaunchPod Media
itunes:subtitle: In this episode of Dear Alice, we talk about how to be a generous host. From the food you choose, the music you play, the lighting, and even the set up of the furniture.
